layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x116

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x100
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x100 [bgcolor=#0000FF]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 200x100
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 200x100

              LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 20x19
                text run at (0,0) width 20: "foo"
